articles.description: Talking body confidence, her new VB body range and fitness regimes with Grazia magazine, the sought-after fashion designer raised the notion that women today want to 'look healthy, and curvy.'
articles.content:
Victoria Beckham insist wanting to be thin is an 'old-fashioned attitude,' after spending much of her youth maintaining a famously slender physique.

articles.title: Prince Harry launches 'online safety toolkit' for children - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Duke of Sussex, who is currently living in his $14 million mansion in California having stepped back from royal duty last year, spoke in a webinar run by the youth charity 5Rights Foundation.
articles.content: Prince Harry said he hopes his children will 'never experience the online world as it exists now' and has blasted social media companies for making 'unimaginable money' from users' attention - as he … [+7188 chars]

articles.title: Lisa Marie Presley believes late son would have loved 'Elvis' movie - CNN
articles.description: Lisa Marie Presley loves Baz Luhrmann's forthcoming film about her legendary father, singer Elvis Presley, and believes her late son would have as well.
